Attacks.Name: Ember
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Flamethrower
Attacks.Effect: This attack causes an explosion. After the attack is resolved, other characters within range 1 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Fire Spin
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Incinerate special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Flash Fire
Superpowers.Effect: When this character is targeted by a energy-type attack, it takes no damage and instead gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Quick Escape
Superpowers.Effect: This character may make an immediate move action.

Attacks.Name: Inferno
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition, and this attack's range is increased by 1 for the rest of the game.

Superpowers.Name: Fiery Rebirth
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all special conditions from this character. It gains 2 power. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Ninetales character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
